```{r}
a = read_html(url)
tab = a %>% html_nodes("table") %>% .[1]
tab = tab %>% html_table %>% .[[1]] 
tab = tab %>% setNames(c("No.", "Title", "Artist(s)"))
tab


table = function(x) {
  url = x
  a = read_html(url)
  tab = a %>% html_nodes("table") %>% .[1]
  tab = tab %>% html_table %>% .[[1]] 
  tab = tab %>% setNames(c("No.", "Title", "Artist(s)"))
  return(tab)
}

table("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billboard_year-end_top_50_singles_of_1958")
```
